on reading compounds: 戦友【センユウ】comrade in arms, war buddy, fellow soldier
kun reading compounds: 友【とも】friend, companion, comrade, pal, accompaniment, companion (e.g. book), complement, accessory
リア友【リアとも】real-life friend (as opposed to online friend)
酒のお供【さけのおとも】appetizer or snack served with drinks, accompaniment to an (alcoholic) drink
